mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_POST (ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (SEQ_POST.NEXTVAL, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT P.ID, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_READ_COUNT, P.MEMBER_ID, P.CREATED_DATE, P.UPDATED_DATE, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER M JOIN TBL_POST P ON M.ID = P.MEMBER_ID AND P.ID = #{id}
